heroDescription: We are one of the trusted motorcycle rental services in Malang. Many local and international tourists have used our service and were very satisfied. Comfortable bikes, complete documents, and friendly service make your journey pleasant.
motorDescription: You can choose from several popular options at affordable rental prices. Motorbike colors depend on our available stock.
term1: Payment must be made in advance.
term3b: Tourists: KTP + additional documents (Passport / Insurance / valid credit card / Rp800,000 deposit)
term3c: Non-student Malang residents: 2 documents + Rp2,500,000 deposit or valid credit card
